Society would have to redefine intelligence and intelligence quotient (IQ) tests, as the current system is designed to measure a narrow range of cognitive abilities.
There would be a significant shift in the job market, with many jobs becoming automated or obsolete, and new jobs emerging that require a high level of intelligence.
There would be a significant increase in creativity and innovation, as more people would have the ability to think outside the box and come up with new ideas.
There would be a significant increase in the ability to solve complex problems, as more people would have the ability to analyze and understand complex information.
There would be a significant increase in the ability to understand and communicate with others, as more people would have the ability to empathize and understand different perspectives.
